name: TableStyleGroups
shortdesc: A collection of table style groups.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TableStyleGroup (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TableStyleGroup.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleGroup with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleGroup with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleGroup with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleGroups within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyleGroup, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TableStyleGroup, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyleGroup, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TableStyleGroup, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TableStyleGroup in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TableStyleGroup in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TableStyleGroup in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleGroup with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the TableStyleGroup that follows the desired TableStyleGroup.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleGroup whose index follows the specified TableStyleGroup in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyleGroup whose index comes before the desired TableStyleGroup.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TableStyleGroup in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TableStyleGroup in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TableStyleGroup.
Returns the TableStyleGroup with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
